Quickstrike:







Quickstrike screamed as he was shot by Hiss. He fell back from the log he
was resting on. He landed on his side, trying to grip his leg. He rolled and
screamed from the pain. He reached for his upper leg.

He managed to look at it. It looked worse than it had before. Now it had
several singe and dent marks on his upper silvery leg, rather than just the
open slice on it.

The grunted and squealed, looking out at his comrades. "Run!" he said,
almost barely thinking. "Run, we gotta get outta here!" He hoped someone
would come to him and get him out of this mess.
